function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High disruption to the construction industry due to COVID-19","Impact":"Disruption of construction projects and stakeholder impact","Mitigation":"Strict implementation of health and safety protocols, contingency planning","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, digital collaboration tools","People":"Construction workers, project managers, stakeholders","Owner":"Construction industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Variation in impacts among multiple stakeholders","Impact":"Differential impact on various stakeholders in the construction industry","Mitigation":"Tailored mitigation strategies for different stakeholder groups, effective communication","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms, stakeholder engagement systems","People":"Different stakeholder groups in the construction industry","Owner":"Project managers, industry associations, regulatory bodies"}]}
